objects.text:
• 7-Quart Capacity
• Digital Controls
• Locking Lid Design
• Travel-Safe Handles

product_details.description: Whether you’re feeding friends and family at home, or taking your meal on the go or to an event, the Crockpot 7 QT Cook & Carry Programmable Slow Cooker makes sharing a home-cooked meal with loved ones easy and effortless. The Cook & Carry travel-proof locking lid provides a tight seal to prevent leaks and spills, for no mess on the go, and convenient handles make it easy to carry and take your favorite slow cooked meals anywhere. A digital countdown control allows you to easily program your slow cooker from 30 minutes up to 20 hours. When cooking is completed, temperature automatically shifts to warm mode to avoid overcooking. The digital display also lets you track your meal progress and monitor remaining cook time. With a 7-quart capacity, it cooks meals for 9+ people, perfect for feeding a crowd. When you’re finished slow cooking, both the lid and the stoneware can be placed in the dishwasher for easy cleanup.

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and clean product promotion layout for a kitchen appliance. The background combines soft, overlapping geometric shapes with muted tones for an elegant and minimal design. A prominent product image is centrally placed, drawing immediate attention. Bold, large typography is used for the headline (`heading`) and subheadline (`subheading`) to clearly communicate the product type and feature. A list of key benefits is shown in a smaller, clean font (`description`) to provide quick, digestible information. The price (`price`) is prominently displayed in a bold style, with a clear call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled with `cta` text. 

**Color Palette:**
- Background Light Grey: `#F5F5F5`
- Banner Segment Beige: `#E0E0E0`
- Decorative Circle Beige: `#D7B19D` (with opacity variations)
- Accent Brown: `#6C4A33`
- Highlight Tan: `#AD8B73`
- CTA Button: `#8D7B68`
- CTA Text: `#FFFFFF`
- Body Text Dark Grey: `#333333`
product_color: The product image uses a modern and minimalistic color scheme dominated by cool, neutral tones. The primary color is a matte, medium gray (#6D6E6C), covering most of the slow cooker body, conveying stability and sophistication. Accents of soft off-white (#EFEFEF) and pale gray (#D3D3D3) are found on the display panel and lid edge, adding contrast while maintaining visual subtlety. The control buttons appear in a warmer beige tone (#E8DDCF), giving a balanced warmth amidst the cool hues. These colors blend harmoniously, with the white “crockpot” logo (#FFFFFF) highlighted prominently for brand visibility. Ideal banner palette: #6D6E6C, #EFEFEF, #D3D3D3, #E8DDCF, #FFFFFF.
